refnamediv.refpurpose: Finds the positive difference values between consecutive spectral frames.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Finds the positive difference values between consecutive spectral frames.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Finds the positive difference values between consecutive spectral frames. At each new frame of wsigin, each magnitude value is compared with its predecessor, and the positive changes written to the output spectrum. This unit is useful as an energy onset detector.

informalexample.programlisting: wsig2 specdiff wsig1 ; sense onsets wsig3 specfilt wsig2, 2 ; absorb slowly specdisp wsig2, 0.1 ; & display both spectra specdisp wsig3, 0.1
